title: Gragas needs a buff.
body: Gragas is so under powered right now. He is absolutely useless now that he can't 1 shot with Q + R combo. pls buff him as he is my main k thx.

replies.body:
You know it's funny you should say that, Gragas is a very unique champion when it comes to tweaks on his kit or damage output. From when I started playing League of Legends Gragas has been repeatedly nerfed, at a guess roughly 5 times, and even the kit has been changed since then because Gragas was still too strong!

It's about the kit. The kit that Gragas possesses/possessed can be extremely volatile if tampered with too much, Vlad is another example of this.. Any buff would potentially make them overpowered, but yet it feels necessary because they aren't as strong as they once were. Extremely delicate situations like this in my opinion call for either a full rework or trial and error knowing full well they may become overpowered for a period of time.
